description: This file defines a React functional component named 'EmptyState' that renders a visually consistent component to indicate an empty or no-results state, with customizable props for title, message, icon, and action handling.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = "Nothing to show", message = "Try adjusting your search or filters.", actionLabel, onAction, icon = "🌊", inline = false, children = null, ...rest })
methods.description: React component rendering an empty state UI with customizable props.
